data_table.description: Ankle Brachial Blood Pressure Index, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: BPUB02
variable.description: Ankle systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]

variable.name: ARMSBP43
variable.description: Redefined supine brachial systolic blood pressure [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]

variable.name: ABI44
variable.description: Ankle Brachial Index, visit 4 (definition 4) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]

variable.name: ABIV4
variable.description: Ankle Brachial Index measured at visit 4 [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]
variable.value: Ankle Brachial Index not measured at visit 4
Ankle Brachial Index measured at visit 4, but one or both blood pressure values out of range, so no valid value
Ankle Brachial Index measured at visit 4, but value is invalid
Ankle Brachial Index measured at visit 4 and has a valid value

variable.name: PAD42
variable.description: PAD42 [peripheral artery disease, visit 4 (definition 2) , Ankle Brachial Index <.9 for both genders] [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]

variable.name: PAD41
variable.description: PAD41 [peripheral artery disease, version 4 (definition 1)] [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]

variable.name: LEGANK41
variable.description: Leg for ankle blood pressure at visit 4 (definition 1) [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]
variable.value: UBAB02D (scan date, day)= an even number
UBAB02D (scan date, day) is missing and V4DATE41= an even number for the day part
UBAB02D (scan date, day)= an odd number
UBAB02D (scan date, day) is missing and V4DATE41= an odd number for the day part

variable.name: LEGSAM14
variable.description: Same leg-ankle blood pressure at visit 1 and visit 4 [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]

variable.name: LEGSAM34
variable.description: Same leg-ankle blood pressure at visit 3 and visit 4 [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]

variable.name: INCPAD4
variable.description: Incident peripheral artery disease at visit 4 [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]

variable.name: INCPAD
variable.description: Incident peripheral artery disease at visit 3 or visit 4 [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC participant ID [Ankle Brachial BP Index, exam 4]
